channel.title: Kesugi Ridge Traverse
channel.description: Recent content on Kesugi Ridge Traverse

item.title: Course Description
item.description: The point-to-point Kesugi Full Traverse starts at Little Coal Creek Trailhead and finishes at Byers Lake Campground. It is approximately 30 miles. The Kesugi Ridge Half Traverse (not held in 2020 due to COVID-19 pandemic) starts at Little Coal Creek Trailhead and finishes just beyond the Ermine Hill Trail Junction. It is approximately 14.2 miles. (Participants will then travel 3.5 miles at their own leisure to the Parks Highway via the Ermine Hill Trail).
